subject: Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Kevin Minter of L.S.U., Jarvis Jones of Georgia, Dion Jordan of Oregon, C.J. Mosley of Alabama and Manti Te’o of Notre Dame were named the finalists for the Butkus Award.
snippet: Kevin Minter of L.S.U., Jarvis Jones of Georgia, Dion Jordan of Oregon, C.J. Mosley of Alabama and Manti Te’o of Notre Dame were named the finalists for the Butkus Award.
